$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/emojis-dropdown.title: $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/emojis-dropdown
$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/emojis-dropdown.text:
\define toolbar-button-emojis-inner()
<$button tag="a">

<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="replace-selection"
	text={{$(snippetTitle)$}}
/>

<$action-deletetiddler
	$tiddler=<<dropdown-state>>
/>

<$view tiddler=<<snippetTitle>> field="caption" mode="inline">

<$view tiddler=<<snippetTitle>> field="title" mode="inline"/>

</$view>

</$button>
\end

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/emojis]!has[draft.of]sort[caption]]" variable="snippetTitle">

<<toolbar-button-emojis-inner>>

</$list>

$:/xp/CSS3Emoji/css3-emoji-animation.css.title: $:/xp/CSS3Emoji/css3-emoji-animation.css

$:/xp/CSS3Emoji/readme.title: $:/xp/CSS3Emoji/readme

CSS3 Emoji.title: CSS3 Emoji

emoji angry.title: emoji angry

emoji grin.title: emoji grin

emoji laugh.title: emoji laugh

emoji love.title: emoji love

emoji sad.title: emoji sad

emoji shocked.title: emoji shocked

emoji smile.title: emoji smile

emoji speechless.title: emoji speechless
